titles: The knight and the beggar-wench. Which doth a wanton prank unfold, in as merry a story as ever was told. The tune is, The Kings delight, or Turn-coat.
publisher: Printed for F. Coles, M. Wright, T. Vere, & W. Gilbertson.,
notes: Date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
